channel.title: Gauntlet Blog: Free from the Yoke Rokugan
channel.description:
On the blog today I go through my hack of the amazing *Free from the Yoke* to *Legend of the Five Ring*'s Rokugan setting. I talk about some of the problematic aspects of the game, the mechanical changes made, and offer a complete character keeper for using this. We played eight sessions of this last year and really enjoyed it.
